value:
Feels like it's been an age since my
mercenary days in Bern. I hope
Natalie is faring well without me...

Back when I was a mercenary, I met
a girl named Lyn. She put things into
perspective for me.$k$pAnd now, here I am...

You're looking a bit pale. A good
warrior knows when to take a break.
Go sit down for a spell.

You want to hear about my wife?
Well, I can't say I have many
interesting tales, but... All right.

Between training sessions, I like to
look at this picture Natalie drew for
me. It's a self-portrait.

You're $Nu?
I'm counting on you to look after
$Nf.

I can't help but worry whenever I
start feeling this good.
Seems fine.
I need to do better. For Natalie.

Still can't believe this is all
really happening.

The name's Dorcas. I used to fight as
a mercenary in Bern, but... Well,
that's all in the past now.

I became a mercenary to earn money
for my wife's medicine. The job took
me off the straight and narrow.$k$pBut then I met Lyn and the others...
They set me straight. Helped me see
things clearly again.$k$pI want to do right by them for all
they've done for Natalie and me.$k$pI know you're all fighting for a good
cause, just like Lyn... And I don't plan
on making the same mistake twice.$k$pI hope you'll let me continue fighting
by your side for as long as I can.
ふんっ！
すまんな…
うああっ！
死にはしない…
For Natalie!
You're not killing me.
I'm making it home alive.
I'll do whatever it takes!
Natalie...I'm sorry...
Haha
I'm no Hero. It takes all I have just to survive.
How's my health? Well, I had some bad mutton earlier, but I feel fine otherwise...
I was a mercenary once. But it was only for the money.
My wife's sick... She can't walk. But the medicine she needs is so expensive.
I keep one of Natalie's pictures on me.
I will make it home at all costs. She's waiting for me...
If my skills are useful to you, use them as you see fit.
Got it.
What's next?
Give me an order.
